remarks: Part of proof after Lemma N of [Crawley] p. 122.  Reverse ordering property.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Mar-2014.)

B ) /\ ( ( Q .\/ ( X ./\ W ) ) = X /\ ( R .\/ ( Y ./\ W ) ) = Y /\ ( ( J ` Q ) .(+) ( I ` ( X ./\ W ) ) ) C_ ( ( J ` R ) .(+) ( I ` ( Y ./\ W ) ) ) ) ) -> Q .<_ ( R .\/ ( Y ./\ W ) ) ) $.
